introSectionTitle: Move to a freshly painted home!
introSectionText: Regardless of whether you are moving in soon or have already done so, take the opportunity to freshen up your new home by repainting or hanging some wallpaper! Just answer a few questions and we will help you find skilled and reliable painters, no matter your request!
bodyTitle: Get a quote for your project
servicesTitle: What services can we help you with?
areaTitle: What’s the size of the area?
infoBoxText1: Tell us a little about your project by filling out the form.
infoBoxText2: We’ll make suggestions for the best painters and get back to you within a working day.
infoBoxText3: Our skilled painters carry out your request, satisfaction guaranteed and the right to ROT-deduction.
servicesHelpText: Select the services you wish to get help with. You can adjust your choice later.
areaHelpText: Enter the approximate area that should be painted or wallpapered. It does not need to be exact, it’s just to give us an idea of the size of the job.
ceilingHeightHelpText: Enter the ceiling height in metters so that the painters know if they need any extra equipment. Enter the heighest point of the ceiling, if it varies.
descriptionHelpText: Summarize your project and let us know if there is something we should be aware of.
modalText: We have received your request and will get back to you shortly!
